data.sourceExcerpt:
1. Submission
Offers must be submitted through the Authority e-procurement portal no later than 12:00 CET on 14 May 2026. The submission must include a technical offer and a commercial offer as separate PDF files. File naming conventions apply.

2. Eligibility and declarations
Bidders shall include signed declarations regarding eligibility, non-collusion, and confidentiality. The Authority may request additional documentation during clarification.

3. Data protection and security
The Contractor will process personal data. Evidence of information security controls (ISO 27001 certification or equivalent) is requested.

4. Delivery and acceptance
The delivery shall follow the milestone schedule described in Annex B. Acceptance testing will be performed prior to go-live. Acceptance criteria are referenced but not specified in measurable terms.

5. Support and SLA
The Contractor shall provide support services. The tender mentions response times and escalation paths but does not explicitly define whether service hours are business hours or 24/7.

6. Evaluation
Awards will be based on price (40%), technical approach (40%), and team experience (20%).
